data_meta.titleEn: Reporting a Lost Passport While Travelling
data_meta.titleKo: Reporting a Lost Passport While Travelling

sentences.speaker: Tom
sentences.sentence: Excuse me, I seem to have lost my passport.

sentences.speaker: Lisa
sentences.sentence: The first thing you need to do is report it to the local police.

sentences.speaker: Tom
sentences.sentence: Once I've reported it, then what?

sentences.speaker: Lisa
sentences.sentence: Then, you should contact your embassy.

sentences.speaker: Lisa
sentences.sentence: They will guide you on the next steps.

expressions.desc: 대화에서 Lisa는 '신고하다'를 사용하여 Tom에게 잃어버린 여권에 대해 현지 경찰에 알리라고 지시합니다.
expressions.example_en: She reported the incident to the police.

sentences.sentence: 신고를 하고 나면 어떻게 해야 하나요?
그런 다음에는 본국의 대사관에 연락해야 합니다.
그들이 다음 단계를 안내해 줄 것입니다.
